documents.document: Okay imma stop before I cry happysad tears in the middle of Disneyland. âœŒðŸ»ï¸ðŸ˜¶
And that is an incredible gift.
And everyday for me is a reminder of his legacy and another reason to be grateful for the guidance he gave me while he was here.
But everyday it gets easier and instead of sad and empty now that he's gone, I feel my heart filling when Something reminds me of him.
But I can't do that anymore, and it hurts like hell but I'm learning how to get through that. It's a work in progress. I'm new to this.
And normally, I'd stop by his class to say hi and tell him how they are. And for a little while, it'd be like I never left and I loved that.
Had it not been for my time with them and Mr. Payne's support. And today, I got to talk with these people I haven't seen in 5-7 years.
I met some really amazing people and figured out what I wanted to do with my life in that class. I wouldn't be the person I am today ...
Today I saw four of the kids I worked with while a TA in Mr.Payne's class and it reminded me of some really amazing things.
@kidkelly do you know what playlist the XM preview channel uses when previewing your show? I'm desperately hunting for one yesterday's songs
To me, drinking beer is like buying a soda, but the syrup is out and you take a huge sip of carbonated water. Like, this is not what I want.
How you know it's real: you and your best friend do the Aladdin musical finale "Friend Like Me" reprise choreo while watching World of Color
No one will ever love anyone the way dogs love everyone. ðŸ¶ â¤ï¸
I came to this theater to watch Arrival, and yet, I said Passengers when I saw a poster of Chris Pratt anyway. And bought the ticket. Oops.
@MyFavMurder the female driving app you mentioned on the Bell House episode is @SeeJaneGoInc and it's live in the OC and will be in LA soon.
"Thanks for tolerating the book you hate for me." - @amywalsh who has finally gotten to my least favorite reading assignment of high school
@taylorannlaw it also tells you to share your screenshots. I am not a fan.
Like this is 100% the motivation I needed after realizing EXACTLY how far behind I am on my #NaNoWriMo novel.
My Best Friends Are The BEST Best Friends, a series, Volume 37294629: https://t.co/2iAWqizeWk
The Starbucks I'm at just had a last call for alcohol and I am amused and also confused because that just happened?!?
We've had lightning and thunder storms for the past 16 hours, and honestly this is the most relaxed I've been in a long time.
WOW. I thought I was getting a lot of unpleasant campaign emails from candidates for city office. But then I checked my spam filter. ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜”
"I feel hot. And not the girl kind of hot." - my eight-year-old brother explaining he feels overheated.

after years of spelling "Hilary" {As in Hilary Duff} I only JUST realized my mistake.
I'VE EVEN BEEN FIGHTING MY AUTOCORRECT ON THIS.
If @HillaryClinton becomes our next president, I'm gonna really have to work at not misspelling her first name.
Just found out that my typing speed is above average, which makes me feel better about having completely abandoned proper form in 3rd grade.
@amywalsh I even bragged to dad about it. Baby steps. Baby steps.
.@amywalsh just turned to try to look at a section of her hair that is curling strangely and yelled "Fight Me!"
.@taylorannlaw and I just discovered we each only like opposing halves of a bag of @mikeandike Zours. #soulmates
My neighbors drove off in their loud, obnoxious sports cars and were revving the engines and I can actually smell the exhaust in my room.
So ridiculously proud of this woman right here. ðŸ˜˜â¤ï¸ https://t.co/0KHkBucYDs
@taylorannlaw to clarify she wants to do double date married couple things and have children in the same daycare. These are our life goals
"I want to have those married times with you" - @taylorannlaw who is often scared I won't get married.
I'm actually at the point in my life when I'm not certain if someone's engaged or married relationship status on Facebook is a joke or not.
@taylorannlaw but, like, of all the issues to have, I'm pretty chill with these ones.
I think this is the highest evolution. We've transcended purchasing our vices and have returned to the barter system. @taylorannlaw
Like they say you become your best friends... @taylorannlaw
@taylorannlaw and I are trading beauty blenders for stickers, which is hysterical because we are corrupting each other with what we buy most
"You've got your old guy celebrity crush, I have mine, and everyone else has theirs"- a conversation I never thought I'd have with my mother
My mom has such a type and I can't stop laughing.
@ashleyyonamine OH MY GOD SO THE CODE WORKED
@ashleyyonamine hahahaha no. I almost got it to work but each time I added a cover it deleted the previous one or logged me out. Uncool
And that doesn't include the other 2 hours I spent trying to do these covers. With 2 computers and 3 wifi networks. I am so sad.
I've actually been at this for an hour and a half. And all it does is say please wait. Whyyyyy #erincondren WHY
Been trying to customized 2 photo Erin Condren covers and the website is so slow on both computers that that I'm gonna miss the sale.
"You need to get a boyfriend so we can do this..." @taylorannlaw to me in a regular basis.
The British: "What should we call them?" "Well they're angry all the time. How about Angryland?" "No, wait. I've got it. IREland."
@malekamau I read that there was a twist that explained everything but for all the ways I imagined, I didn't think of it until it was there
@malekamau well now I am a puddle of tears. That ending was amazing.
I can hear my mother watching the 2005 Pride and Prejudice film downstairs and if anything gets me to do something today, that will be it.
@malekamau okay good because I was debating starting it and this is reassuring.

To put it into perspective, this is the first September I'm not in school since before my sister was born. And she's about to turn 18.
Things I didn't think would be a problem until they were: Everyone's back to school except me and now I'm sad.
@katzmeifyoucan I just added him to my VIP email list so I'd get a notification. I'd probably combust if I kept refreshing my inbox.
and the best part is I'm zero% surprised by this response and honestly would be concerned if there was anything more there.

Like omg so proud of my Scorpion King. Sweet precious child. So proud.
The greatest thing about #CursedChild is everyone is starting to love Scorpius as much as I have for the last 9 years.
"I didn't think so. I mean, you're a Slytherin not a Gryffindor." - Me to Christine.
His advice for men whose wives are upset with them: "just shake your booty" until it's better.
His song "shake your booty shake your butt" is second on his CD in case you were wondering.
"The world would be a better place if everybody just shook their booty more." - dude rapping on the pier right now
Double the throwback because my best friend turns 22 today and Timehop knows how important she is to me. https://t.co/IO7XdNrx6x
"I'm twenty-two for a moment.."

"Personally, I enjoy sunburns" - @amywalsh (who might be a crazy person)
Frankly, I'm surprised it took me til mid-July to get my first sunburn of 2k16. I didn't think I could stay indoors that long but I did.
A month from now, I'm going to be hanging out with @apriosmtz94 and I don't think I could even BE more excited.
@YulinKuang thanks times a million!!
@YulinKuang @kirstynhippe are lyrics for #IShipItSeries out yet? My sister and I are fighting over a line and it's driving me crazy.
